S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-6362: CHECK constraint uses wrong schema for unqualified routine invocations
Part 3:
- Refactor code that rewrites trigger actions so that it can be reused for rewriting CHECK constraints.
- Rewrite CHECK constraints and make all identifiers schema qualified before storing them in the dictionary.
- Make the parser preserve the TableName node for the target type in CAST expressions for user-defined types, so that they get detected by the rewrite logic.
